channel.title: How do I activate my server on the server status?
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg121/piepk/status.jpg[/img]
How do I know if my server is verified??
I conected to my server with this ID/PW is this all I have to do.. ?

item.title: How do I activate my server on the server status?
item.dc:creator: @owner_ruthless owner ruthless
item.description:
@owner_ruthless wrote:

got a problem with that too i dont get the bit when it says “and make it able to connect to this ip: and so on?”
how do i make able to connect to that ip?

Read full topic

item.title: How do I activate my server on the server status?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

All you have to do is create the account with that username/password, and it will connect every time the status page is updating (every 30 minutes, iirc), to see if it’s online/offline.

Read full topic
